title: Garry Kasparov: Putin, Deep Blue and the Future of AI
description: Garry Kasparov, chess-champion, Putin-critic and author of the new book Deep Thinking, talks to Chuck about the future of artificial intelligence and what to expect from Putin's Russia.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
